displayName.text: Park East Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery PC

authorAttributions.displayName: Park East Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery PC
Park East Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery PC

adrFormatAddress: 30 E 60th St # 1401, NewYork, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Black is absolutely amazing! I went in for a wisdom tooth consultant and he spent about half an hour with me reviewing my x-rays and explained every single detail. When it came down to the day of surgery he was just as great, he took time to explain the procedure, his nurse was so nice and accommodated my extreme fear of needles. I felt so comfortable with them, he even called later that night to make sure I was ok.

originalText.text: So I had 2 wisdom teeth extracted TODAY with Dr. Black after an oral surgeon closer to home was not comfortable doing it because of where the nerve was in comparison to the tooth. It’s been 6 hours since I had them removed. Dr. Black you are amazing. Those hands are gifted. I also want to thank Vicky and Carmen for just being super nice people. You guys really are what’s good in the world.

text.text: So I had 2 wisdom teeth extracted TODAY with Dr. Black after an oral surgeon closer to home was not comfortable doing it because of where the nerve was in comparison to the tooth. originalText.text: Dr. Black, Vicki, and Carmen were amazing. I was a nervous wreck because i needed to take out two wisdom teeth. They assured me everything would go fine and they kept their word. Dr. Black was the first doctor I met that knew prices, deductible, and about insurances which i found quite impressive. Carmen was friendly and helpful with questions. Vicki was calm and explained each process. I will gladly come back to them if i have any issues. They are a dream team. Thanks once again

originalText.text: I rarely write any reviews but my experience with Dr. Black and his stuff was wonderful: cozy office, not a minute wait appointments, follow up calls. Dr. Black is a very experiences surgeon and very attentive to your needs. The best dental office's  service that I've had in years.

text.text: I rarely write any reviews but my experience with Dr. Black and his stuff was wonderful: cozy office, not a minute wait appointments, follow up calls. Dr. Black is a very experiences surgeon and very attentive to your needs. The best dental office's  service that I've had in years.

originalText.text:
Worst dentist ever.  Had 15 minutes of anesthesia for my daughter's wisdom tooth removal; Dr. Black charged 45 minutes worth.  When I challenged him, he threatened to make up other charges.  Then I find out he charged my insurance for 6-month regular check up, which he did not do...it was surgery; so when we did the 6-mth check up, insurance wouldn't cover it.
Dr. Black is not fair when it comes to charging the insurance company.  Totally unethical. And if you challenge him, he pulls extra charges threats.
